short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Forked from the original News Feed Eradicator. Now also removes notifications, and provides site visit counts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Forked from the original News Feed Eradicator. Now also removes notifications, and provides site visit counts.

From the original: "Find yourself spending too much time on Facebook? Eradicate distractions by replacing your entire news feed with an inspiring quote."
